parameters.name: BackupSetId
parameters.description:
The ID of the backup file. You can call the [DescribeBackups](~~473823~~) operation to query the ID.

*   If you need to specify multiple backup file IDs, separate them with commas (,). For example, you can set this parameter to `12345,67890`.
*   If you do not specify this parameter, the system automatically backs up the task and performs cache analysis on the backup file.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The ID of the data node on the instance. You can specify this parameter to query the monitoring information about the specified node.

>  If you specify the BackupSetId parameter, the system ignores the NodeId parameter. You can call the [DescribeLogicInstanceTopology](~~473786~~) operation to query the node ID.

parameters.name: Separators
parameters.description: The delimiters used to identify the prefixes of keys. You do not need to specify this parameter if one or more of the following default delimiters are used: `: ; , _ - + @ = | #`
